argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pnpncand.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | pnpncand.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | pnpncand.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_subcld | |- ( ph -> ( B - C ) e. CC ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_addcld | |- ( ph -> ( A + ( B - C ) ) e. CC ) |
| 6 | 5, 2, 3 | #P_subsub2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + ( B - C ) ) - ( B - C ) ) = ( ( A + ( B - C ) ) + ( C - B ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 4 | #P_pncand | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + ( B - C ) ) - ( B - C ) ) = A ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + ( B - C ) ) + ( C - B ) ) = A ) |
